title: ALOHA!! WAITLIST OPEN!! BEAUTIFUL 2X1 $2,299 CALL TODAY!!
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to Aloha', 'The Aloha Apartments in Hayward is ready to be your home.', 'Be sure to come for a visit to check out the apartment floorplan options.', 'The Aloha Apartments offers a variety of amenities including: convenient on-site parking options, tile floors, and smoke free options.', 'Come see The Aloha Apartments today.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 31', 'OR Text', '31', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 780 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Cable Ready', '- Vinyl Wood Floors', '- Disposal', '- Smoke Free', '- High Speed Internet Access', '- Heating', 'Community Amenities', '- Laundry Facilities', '- Gated', '- Pool', 'Pet Policy', '2 Pet Policy (per apartment)', 'Breed Restrictions', '1x Pet Deposit (per pet)', 'Monthly Pet fee (per pet)', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Aloha', '250 W Jackson St, Hayward, CA, 94544', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'G81J1owwU31']
